Sublimation & The Poetics Of Space

Perhaps the question of "free will" in the sense of how to find or create the mental fortitude to make the decisions we should is more urgent than the quasi-metaphysical question of what causes those decisions in "Me".

Some determinists seem to want to replace any notion of a person with a set of gravitational equations which may have already been solved somewhere in a middle school classroom in rural arkansas by a precocious algebra student doing some extra-curricular work on their TI-89.

Here is an admittedly incendiary passage from The Poetics Of Space to remind us that we're living:





and here is a translation from a forum to help make sense of it:
